posting_body: ['**-- MASSIVE STUDIO -- WASHER DRYER IN UNIT -- QUEEN BED FITS -- LUXURY BUILDING --**', 'Listing ID #: 212829', 'Price: $3,595', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: Studio', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Bicycle Room', 'Business Center', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Concierge', 'Diplomats OK', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Pool', 'Roof Deck', 'Storage', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'Wheelchair Access', 'WiFi', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'River View', 'This massive studio is easily convertible to a 1 bedroom unit OR great as is!', 'washer/dryer in unit.', 'beautiful finishes.', '**Broker fee applies', 'Other building amenities include: ROOFTOP POOL Private Fitness Center Peloton Bikes Work-From-Home Lounges Yoga Studio Storage Space', 'Located in the heart of the Financial District, this building is within walking distance to the South Street Seaport, Brookfield Place, and all major subway lines (1,2,3,A,C,E,Path train)', 'Contact Anthony today to book an appointment!', 'Call/text @ 917 721 3315 or Email:', '<URL>', 'Anthony Bernard', 'Phone: (212) 402-7855', 'Mobile: 9177213315', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (212) 402-7855 \xa0 9177213315 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Anthony Bernard at 9177213315']
